comment: Great Professor! Class is mandatory but she makes it very interesting and easy to understand. A couple quizzes over some short readings, her tests are easy IF YOU STUDY. As long as you put in a little bit of effort you will be totally fine, would recommend over and over again!
Good story teller! Class was pretty interesting. I had to work very hard to get an A, but I just attended all classes and took good notes. Very nice teacher
Great teacher. She presents the information as a story and is very passionate about it. She is very straight foward about what she expects.
I have her class late in the day. It can be boring sometimes, but the class is super easy and she is a sweetheart.
Great teacher!  As long as you go to class everyday, you don't need the book!  She makes history interesting, even if you hated history class in the past.  You must study notes to get an A.

Personality is good, but has a left leaning slant.  Tests are standard multiple choice, short answer, essay type tests.  Essays get larger the closer it gets to the end of the semester.  She gives you everything you need for the essays, however.
